item.title: 'World Cup Starts In March': USA's Pochettino Understands No Time Left To Waste
item.description: Mauricio Pochettino won't treat the USA's last few 2026 World Cup tuneups as mere friendlies.

item.title: Travis and Jason Kelce Help Laila Edwards' Family Attend Her Olympic Debut
item.description: Laila Edwards' parents are thrilled to join her at the 2026 Winter Olympics next week, thanks to Travis and Jason Kelce.

item.title: What Are the 10 Worst First Ballot Snubs in History of Pro Football Hall of Fame?
item.description: Following Bill Belichick's Hall of Fame snub, we ranked the 10 biggest first ballot snubs in the history of the Pro Football Hall of Fame.

item.title: No. 14 Kansas Expects Darryn Peterson Back Against AJ Dybantsa, No. 13 BYU
item.description: Kansas expects to have Darryn Peterson available Saturday when the No. 14 Jayhawks welcome fellow freshman star AJ Dybantsa and No. 13 BYU.

item.title: Cold Temps, Snow & No Race Heats: Here's the Clash Forecast, Format
item.description: NASCAR's Clash will look at little different this year. Find out how the cold temps will impact racing at Bowman Gray.
